alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 11:48PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Gusty Canyon Winds Through The Early Overnight Hours... Easterly canyon winds have developed behind a cold front across the Northern Wasatch Front this evening. These enhanced canyon winds will then develop near canyons across the eastern Salt Lake Valley around midnight, followed by canyons in Utah county shortly after midnight. These winds are expected to gradually diminish between 2AM and 4AM. Wind gusts in the 45-55 mph are most likely, with a medium chance for a brief gust to 60 mph from Farmington to Centerville. These easterly canyon winds will lead to crosswinds and difficult driving conditions on north-south routes. Drivers of high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers should reduce driving speeds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley
